name: Quick Fix (Gabriel Bissonnette)
description:
Oof! The war is over, finally.

Unfortunatly, bridges are always the first thing to be destroyed.

Your job is to build new ones and test them before someone noticed that they can't go to the neighbor city to buy that scented strawberry candle because the entire bridge collapsed.

If your bridge is approved, you can go to the next city to fix their little problem too.

Quick, build some new ones!! and make sure they work.
